Build id: 200405190010.

I opened a java file, and I scrolled down and pressed enter to begin editing the
file - but instead the workbench stuttered for a moment, and after I checked my
.log and it regained responsiveness, I noticed everytime I pressed enter it
temporarily copied the line below where I am pressing enter. The file was in
fact not being edited though, and it just looks like some sort of repainting
glitch. I closed and re-opened the file and have been able to edit it
successfully. Here is the exception which populates my .log file:
